name: Chain (itch)
description:
(This title is still in development and was uploaded in its current state for a gamejam)

Chain is an arcade puzzler where the goal is to cause a massive chain reaction to rack up points. Over the next few weeks I will be porting the project to android and launching more formally as a mobile game, however I first wanted to create a pc game for the game jam that inspired it (one button game jam)

Planned Features

  • Online High score tables
  • achievements
  • more orb types

As it is a limited version of what I have planned I chose to release it for free, however if you have fun feel free to consider commenting what you think below or even donating. Even if not however I hope that you enjoy your time spent with chain!
